#summary Examples of bubble charts
#labels Phase-Documentation

This page gives several samples of radar charts.

====Sample 1====
{{{
<pBubble size=400x300 legend colors=F00,0F0,00F,0FF,F0F,FF0 xtitle="Aantal FTE" ytitle="Aantal personen" title="Omzet">
Sales,3,6,20
Marketing,5,2,21
Development,1,5,56
Customer Support,8,8,23
Information Technology,7,4,51
Administration,6,2,38
</pBubble>
}}}

====Sample 2====
{{{
<pBubble size=500x300 legend cross axis=false>
Sales,3,6,20
Marketing,5,2,21
Development,1,5,56
Customer Support,8,8,23
Information Technology,7,4,51
Administration,6,2,38
</pBubble>
}}}
